qas.question: Which sutras are among the earliest Mahayana sutras?
The Prajnaparamita sutras were developed along the krsna river in what region of South India?

context: Several scholars have suggested that the <a0_0>Prajñāpāramitā<a0_0/> sūtras, which are among the earliest Mahāyāna sūtras, developed among the Mahāsāṃghika along the Kṛṣṇa River in the <a1_0>Āndhra<a1_0/> region of South India.
